title: State v. Keith Davis, Jr. – Episode 7 – Bad Facts
description:
May 30, 2019 / Keith Davis Jr’s first trial in February 2016 wasn’t completely devoid of “bad facts” for his defense -- that is, facts, evidence and witnesses that hurt his case. The worst fact of all is the Hammerli Trailside 22, which has Keith's right middle finger and palm print on its multicolored grip. 
 
Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Spencer Burdette, Chris Zabriskie, and Taylor Quimby.
 
This episode was sponsored by Best Fiends and Function of Beauty.
 
Download BEST FIENDS on the Apple App Store or Google Play
www.FunctionofBeauty.com/Undisclosed
